text: Ærest of Stanforda on þa apuldran, on þone haran stan.
Swa on Hennamere.
Of Hennamere on Gosamere, on stan oran.
Of stan oran on<../images/tbar.gif><hlypiget>, of þam hlypgete andlang hamma of ðam hammum on ða sadeludan ac.
Of þære sadeludan æc, on cwenan brigce.
Of cwenan brigce on kynges rode.
Of cynges rode on Eadwaldingstan.
Of ðam stane in Mucan treow of Mucan treowe on ða apuduran.
<../images/tbar.gif>ðanon rihte on Fulan broc.
And swa andlang broces on Bydincel of Bydincele on Loddrawyllon of Lodderawyllon on clæg weg.
Andlang clæg weges on sulan ford.
Of ðam forda on þa ealdan byd andlang byd on Deorham.
Of Deorhamme on Mærbroc.
Andlang broces on þone wyrtwalan to þam acholte.
Þonne swa se Wyrtwala sceat on Fearn beorhg.
Of Fearn beorhgan on þa eggce.
Andlang eggce swa be þam heafdon on þone graf.
Swa be ðam Wyrtwalan on þa stræt.
Andlang stræte on Esnes stan.
Of Esnastanne on þone ealdan weg.
Andlang weges adun be ðam graue.
Swa be þam heafdon on Hundes geat.
Of Hundes geate on þone mere.
Of ðam mere swa be Wyrtwalan on þa ealdan dic.
Of þære dic on sticelan stige of þære stige on Fearn leage on Mærbroc.
Andlang Mærbroces on Cuðwealding leage.
Of þære leage on Mærbroc andlang broces on Baddanham.
Of ðam hamme on Byd.
Andlang Byd on Hreodmorwyllon þanon on haranstan & swa on Fileðham.
Ðanon on Cearcesleage.
Of Cearces leage.
On Headdan rode.
Of Headdan rode on Bydewyllon & swa on Emelhylle þonne on west weg.
Of west wege on hric weg.
Andlang weges on Wrænnan leage <suðewearde>.
<../images/tbar.gif>swa on Oxnahealas.
Of oxena healon on Bicanstige.
Of Bican stige on Merces feld of Merces felda on Mærbroc of Mærbroce on Hlidan.
Of Hlydan on M<../images/etail.gif>rsic of Mærsice on Hegestaldes setl.
<../images/tbar.gif>ðanon rihte on Willerdes pol.
And swa andlang Fromes.
<../images/tbar.gif>up on Cweorn cleofu.
Þanon rihte on Befer pyttas.
And swa on Hyddes burhg.
<../images/tbar.gif>on æscburhg.
Of æscbyrig on clæghyrste on þa ealdan wic.
Of ealdan wic on Bydanwyrð.
Of Bydanwyrðe on Sinder ford.
Of Sinderforda andlang Frome eft on Stanford.
